numlitem.para: Approach minimums do not require its use.
For all operations at least 2 IRS's are required for autoland operation. The operative IRS's must be associated with the engaged autopilots.
Downgrade aircraft category dispatch status to CAT 3a with center IRS inoperative.

placard.para: Placard associated L/R Instrument Source Select Switch CTR IRS "INOP" and placard affected IRS Mode Selector on the Inertial Reference Mode Panel (M59) "INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.

numlitem.para: At Captain's and/or F/O's Instrument Source Select Panel, select IRS Left & Right to "NORM" and leave in this position.
